title: Bloomberg Markets: Kessler on Whitman Future, Facebook Earnings
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Kessler on Whitman Future, Facebook Earnings
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Scott Kessler Equity and Industry Research Analyst CFRA Research Discussing Meg Whitman is stepping down from the board of HP and meeting recently with Uber’s leadership.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
